statements: SELECT * FROM email_campaign_results;
SELECT campaign_name, conversion_rate FROM email_campaign_results WHERE strategy_id = 2;
SELECT segment_name, revenue_generated FROM email_campaign_results WHERE campaign_id = 5 ORDER BY revenue_generated DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_campaign_results WHERE conversion_rate > 3.5 AND revenue_generated < 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, strategy_name FROM email_campaign_results WHERE segment_id = 3 ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM email_campaign_results WHERE campaign_id = 1 ORDER BY campaign_name ASC
SELECT campaign_name, strategy_name, segment_name, revenue_generated FROM email_campaign_results WHERE conversion_rate > 10
SELECT campaign_name, strategy_name, segment_name, conversion_rate FROM email_campaign_results WHERE revenue_generated BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000
SELECT campaign_name, segment_name, conversion_rate, revenue_generated FROM email_campaign_results WHERE strategy_name = 'Digital' ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, segment_id, segment_name FROM email_campaign_results WHERE revenue_generated > 5000
SELECT * FROM ab_test_results;
SELECT campaign_name, metric, value FROM ab_test_results WHERE test_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, email, group_id FROM test_users WHERE group_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM ab_test_results ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT test_id, campaign_name FROM ab_test_results WHERE metric = 'clicks';
SELECT * FROM ab_test_results WHERE metric = 'clicks' ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT test_id, campaign_name FROM ab_test_results WHERE metric = 'conversion' ORDER BY test_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(value) AS max_value, MIN(value) AS min_value FROM ab_test_results WHERE campaign_name = 'campaign_A';
SELECT * FROM test_users JOIN ab_test_results ON test_users.user_id = ab_test_results.test_id WHERE test_users.group_id = 1;
SELECT AVG(value) AS avg_value, COUNT(*) AS total_tests FROM ab_test_results WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%campaign%' AND metric = 'engagement';
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, strategy FROM email_campaigns WHERE strategy = 'ABC';
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM test_group WHERE end_date < '2023-06-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, strategy FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM test_group WHERE group_size > 100;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE strategy = 'A/B Testing';
SELECT group_name, start_date, end_date FROM test_group ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT group_id, AVG(metric_1) AS average_metric_1, AVG(metric_2) AS average_metric_2 FROM test_results GROUP BY group_id HAVING AVG(metric_3) > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM EmailCampaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ABTestResults ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT user_id, email_address, conversion_status FROM TestGroupUsers WHERE group_id = 1;
SELECT group_id, test_percentage, start_time, end_time FROM TestGroupSettings WHERE test_completed = TRUE;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT result_id, campaign_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM ABTestResults GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT user_id, email_address, conversion_status FROM TestGroupUsers WHERE conversion_status = 'completed';
SELECT group_id, test_percentage, start_time, end_time FROM TestGroupSettings WHERE test_completed = TRUE;
SELECT E.campaign_name, A.variation_name, T.email_address FROM EmailCampaigns E JOIN ABTestResults A ON E.campaign_id = A.campaign_id JOIN TestGroupUsers T ON A.result_id = T.group_id;
SELECT * FROM ab_test_campaign;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ab_test_campaign;
SELECT user_id, group_assigned FROM user_participation ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, conversion_rate, conversion_status FROM campaign_results WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT metric_id, total_clicks, click_through_rate FROM campaign_metrics ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_participation;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ab_test_campaign WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, group_assigned, participation_date FROM user_participation JOIN campaign_groups ON user_participation.campaign_id = campaign_groups.campaign_id WHERE group_name = 'Control';
SELECT user_id, conversion_status FROM campaign_results WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;

SELECT campaign_name, total_clicks, total_conversions, click_through_rate FROM ab_test_campaign JOIN campaign_metrics ON ab_test_campaign.campaign_id = campaign_metrics.campaign_id WHERE click_through_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY total_conversions DESC;
